transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Oh, hello.
Executive: Hello, Pannalal Harishchandra Handloom se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji ho rahi hai, bataiye.
Executive: Sir, very good, good morning. Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke behalf mein.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Ye apna account IndiaMART ke sath running mein hai na, uske feedback ke liye connect kiya tha maine kal but maybe aap busy thi so maine dobara se connect kiya. Jaan sakta hun kaisa feedback aa raha hai sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: Nahi sir, response hamare liye sahi nahi hai. Hamara jo product hai usse related jo actual product hai usse related us product ka leads nahi milta hai. Toran ka milta hai lekin woolen toran hai wo woolen toran hame nahi mil pata aur phir aur bulk mein nahi milta hai wo chhote chhote do char 10 piece wale leads milte hain.
Executive: Apun door hanging wall aur ye wall hanging aur is tarike ka wo ladies blouse inka manufacturing karte hain ya phir trading karte hain?
Customer: Nahi manufacturing.
Executive: Manufacturing karte hain? To iska matlab ki apna minimum order quantity kya rehta hai?
Customer: Minimum humko chahiye wholesale mein bulk wale chahiye jo.
Executive: Achcha wo aage aap se purchase karke retailing ya wholesaling kar sake wo chahiye?
Customer: Retailing haan, retailing kar sake, wholesaling kar sake wo chahiye.
Executive: Ji ji aur apan log pan India level pe kaam karte hain sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai, isme ek mujhe thoda sa confirm karenge jo bhi aapka product line hai iske andar main category kaun sa jisko aapko sabse jyada matlab ki market mein bhi lead jyada generate hota hai aur aapko matlab ki wo apna main product hai aisa kaun sa category rehta hoga thoda sa mujhe guide karenge?
Customer: Toran hai, woolen toran.
Executive: Ah main torans correct correct correct correct. Torans ke liye category jiska total jo hamare paas lead generate hua hai October month ki baat karu to 352 lead generate hua tha aur 400 lead generate hua tha torans category ke andar wo September month ke andar hua tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai to ek minute dijiyega mujhe aap log IndiaMART toran dekhiye, woolen toran dekhiye.
Executive: Achcha toran bahut tarike ka aata hai apne ko woolen ke andar chahiye.
Customer: Haan woolen hota hai, wooden hota hai and handicraft hota hai, kai tarah ka hota hai matlab plastic beads ka hota hai hame woolen chahiye.
Executive: Woolen se bane hue jo thread se bane hue knitting jo hai knitting wale toran chahiye.
Customer: Woolen se bane hue jo thread se bane hue knitting jo hai knitting wale toran chahiye.
Executive: Ji ji. In puri category ko jaise ki jaise woolen toran bolte hain na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Market mein jo search karega wo woolen toran naam se search karega na sir? Toran bandarwar gate wall hanging to search karenge lekin hamara jo product hai woolen acrylic yarn ka buna hua knitting kiya hua toran hai.
Customer: Hmm. Haan.
Executive: Okay. Ek second dijiyega. Apun log isko matlab material to Bihar, Bengal, Jharkhand side mein jyada sell hota hai offline mein.
Customer: Udhar side jyada rehta hai kyunki ye jo product use hota hai maybe ek middle class family ke liye hota hai jo jyadatar udhar ki side mein hota hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: IndiaMART ka account pehle bhi aap hi dekhte the apne behalf mein koi dusra person to nahi dekhte the aapne pura cross check kiya na us cheez ko?
Customer: Nahi shuru se haan shuru se hum hi dekhe hain aur matlab nahi hame samajh nahi aaya do bar humne kar liya dusri bar play nahi nahi service lekin filhal logon ne guide kiya samjhaya to humne dekha try kiya lekin response sahi nahi mila.
Executive: Thik hai aap ek kaam karenge please maine aapki ek frequency ko change kiya yahan pe categories ko leke so ek bar once aap IndiaMART portal open karenge like mobile app mein hai aapke paas ya computer mein?
Customer: Abhi abhi pass chal raha hai.
Executive: Abhi pass mein hai matlab ki main kaun se time pe connect pe karu jahan pe paanch saat minute aap de denge?
Customer: Usme ye bataiye.
Executive: Main aapko kuch steps guide karunga uske us pe aap click karke aage badhte jaiega aapko woolens ke jo bhi aapke category products hai na uska lead directly show karega sir. Aur yahan pe system ke according kya hota hai na us company ko us supplier ko thoda sa lead ka flow jyada rehta hai jo proper tarike se lead ka utilization karta hai to aapki jo product line hai jaise ki woolen ka torans ki baat kare aap bulk mein bata rahe ya dusra jo bhi woolen ka product hai iski bulk ki baat kare to main uski bulk ki aapki lead ko show karunga aap contact buy now pe at least aap click kar lenge samne wale ek wholesaler hoga is basis pe aapke paas uska purchase pattern create ho jayega aur automatic uska lead ka flow phir se create increase create ho jayega.
Customer: Technical technique jo hai hame nahi idea hai aur hame jisse bhi baat hua last mein humne kai bar samjhaya tha lekin wo proper sahi ho nahi pata phir hamare paas time ka bhi issue ho jata time bhi nahi reh pate hain. Time to wo alag baat hai lekin jab kam hota hai to time dena bhi suitable lagta hai kam nahi hai to phir time to wo cheeze baki kai log milte hain kai tarah ki baatein karte hain guide karte hain lekin sahi sahi guide nahi ho pata isliye thoda sa humko samajh nahi aaya do do bar humne service liya lekin uska koi benefit nahi mil paya.
Executive: Ji ji ji isme main ek better help aapki kar leta hun sir waise jyada kuch technically nahi hai main kuch leads aapko ek bar ke liye whatsapp pe dalta hun aap us lead ko consume karke connect kariye aur phir main aapse dobara se ek bar kal morning mein connect pe karta hun jyada kuch technically nahi rahega agar ye lead aapke liye fruitful nikalti hai ki haan ye lead sahi tha jo main bhej raha hun aapko ya ek do din ke liye main extra aagle ek do din ke liye bhejunga agar aapko lage ki haan thik hai leads wagera to phir main day after tomorrow aapse connect karta hun kuch steps ko guide karta hun sir uske according thoda sa aap utilize kariye maybe bache hue time mein apan log result nikal le kyunki aapka renewal bhi generate ho chuka hai IndiaMART pe isliye.
Customer: Thik hai wo alag baat hai lekin dusra renewal jo hua tha wo humne bataya tha aapko hum karne ka mood nahi tha lekin kitne guide kiya nahi ek bar try karke test karke dekh lijiye lekin phir bhi uska koi benefit nahi mila service log de dete hain uske baad phir sampark hota nahi hai dikkat ye hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir sahi baat hai waise thoda sa online promotion ka bhi kaise hai?
Customer: Dusra koi phir account handle karta hai phir usse alag tarah se naye sire se baat ho phir unse alag tarah se har bar naye naye sire se baat hota hai ek hi baat bar bar explain karna padta hai.
Executive: Main aapke sath connect karta hun whatsapp pe also kuch leads ko share karta hun aap usko consume karke sir ek bar client se connect kariye buyer ke sath aapko kaisa response milta hai ek do din baad aapse dobara se connect pe karta hun bas ek request rahega ki jo bhi leads aapko whatsapp pe dalta hun na sir ek bar aap connect karke dekhiyega buyers ke sath.
Customer: Aap kis zuban se bol rahe hain matlab kahan?
Executive: Main Noida ke head office se baat kar raha hun aapka catalog jo hai meri team mein hi koi account manager handle karta hai main uska senior baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Achcha. Kaun is samay account handle kar raha hai mera?
Executive: Aapka Sabita Mehra karke unke paas aapka account hai sir.
Customer: Iske pehle kaun tha?
Executive: Poonam Diwakar.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Poonam karke thi aapke account manager usse pehle Poonam uske pehle sab list hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Bas total mujhe pura record dekhna padega agar 12 mahine ki baat karu to teen se char account manager aapke hue hain starting mein koi aur tha uske baad change matlab har teen mahine mein ya char mahine mein ek account manager change wo to sir uska reason hota hai ki chahe koi bhi ho aapka account manager usko pura knowledge hota hai us department mein idhar udhar hone ki wajah se wo aapka account manager change ho jata hai aur hame aapki company ko maintain karne ke liye kisi na kisi ko to dena hi padta hai aapka account to is basis pe koi na koi aapka account yahan se manage kar raha hota hai aur aapko uski details direct na mobile application mein bhi dikhti hai aap wahan se check karke direct apne account manager ko connect bhi kar sakte hain ki mera catalog ye hai isme kya issue aa raha hai ki isko isko kaise improve kar sakte hain is tarike se sir.
Executive: Baki aapki baat mere sath directly ho chuki hai to main aapko whatsapp pe ek bar connect karta hun also aapko jo bhi lead share karta hun aap ek bar consume karke dekhiye phir aapko ek bar discuss karte hain main kuch steps guide karunga uske according aap utilize karke dekhiye bache hue time mein result nikalne ki try karte hain sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant buyleads for woolen products.

- Leads received are not in bulk quantity.

- Expressed dissatisfaction with previous service experiences.



Resolution:

- Executive changed frequency for categories.

- Executive offered to share leads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will guide steps to utilize leads effectively.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect tomorrow morning.

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, woolen products, account manager, whatsapp
